name: Nightmare (itch) (AudreyL)
description:
Nightmare was created after a few week's work for a 2020 Level Design class at the University of Central Florida made in Unreal Engine 4. It's a solo project where a level design document and white box were necessary before the final product, and it's is meant to strengthen level design skills and practice programming unique mechanics. Used an asset pack for art.

This project had to be made around the theme "the man behind the curtain." Play as someone running from a monster in a strange place only to realize everything isn't as it seems.

Audrey Luce: Level Designer, Programmer
